PSCT.Base: You can pay 500 LP; reveal 3 "Purrely" cards from your Deck, except "My Friend Purrely", and your opponent randomly picks 1 for you to add to your hand, also shuffle the rest into your Deck. If a face-up "Purrely" Xyz Monster(s) you control leaves the field because of an opponent's card, even during the Damage Step: You can add up to 3 "Purrely" Quick-Play Spells with different names from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "My Friend Purrely" once per turn.
